title: Introducing: Klo.
body:
**Klo.**

(Melbourne cousins Chloe Kaul and Simon Lam) cropped up with their intoxicating debut track, _Make Me Wonder_. Countless blog posts and 75k plays later, the duo return with their second offering, _False Calls_. Again drawing from R&B influences, whilst sticking to their pop roots, they’re part Purity Ring, part Ellie Goulding, and perhaps the latest in a growing number of breakthrough musical duos. Check out both tracks below.
